title: oc6.0 rc4 - file version restore does not work
body:
hello @all 
in the current owncloud-version rc4 the restore-button of the file-version is not clickable. when clicking sometimes nothing happend, sometimes the browser loads until timeout. downloading of older file-versions work, also the file-preview (thumbnail) in file-version window.

greetings

edit: by the way, a delete button for deleting older file-versions would be nice (because of better webspace-use too).

edit2: i found a little design-bug in file-versions. when clicking on a file -> "version" the window doesn't disable,when not clicking something. if you click on different file (for example sharing) there are overlaps.
http://s1.directupload.net/images/131212/83adjrr3.png
